Founder / Design Principal

David Chipperfield Architect

“The difference between a good building and a bad building normally resides in being more thought about.”

The career of British architect David Chipperfield (born 18 December 1953) has spanned decades and continents as an architect, designer and professor. Since 1984, he has been at the helm of David Chipperfield Architects, an award winning firm with over 180 staff at offices in London, Berlin, Milan, and Shanghai.
